title: Unlicensed contractor fraud in the second degree
context: [ยง708-8304] Unlicensed contractor fraud in the second degree. (1) A person commits the offense of unlicensed contractor fraud in the second degree if the person commits unlicensed contractor fraud and the total value of the property over which the person obtains control is less than $20,000. (2) Unlicensed contractor fraud in the second degree is a class C felony. [L 2012, c 244, pt of ยง1]
